timeline.treatment: Tab. HCQ 200 mg OD, Tab. Prednisolone 20 mg OD, Tab. Azathioprine 50 mg OD

timeline.symptom: high grade fever, chills, rigors, vomitings, loose stools
timeline.diagnosis: Acute Gastroenteritis (infective cause) with ruptured sebaceous cyst with polyarthralgia under evaluation
timeline.treatment: IVF - NS, RL @ 100 ml/hr, Inj. Optinneuron 1 amp in 100 ml NS IV/OD, Inj. Neomol 1 gm IV SOS, Inj. Pantop 40 mg IV OD, Inj. Zofer 4 mg IV TID, Inj. Ceftriaxone 1 gm IV BD, Tab. Sporolac -DS PO TID, Tab. Dolo 650 mg PO TID, Tab. Baclofen 12.5 mg PO SOS, ORS sachets in 1 litre of water - 100 ml /stool

notes.physical_exam: patient is conscious, coherent, cooperative, thin built and poorly nourished, mild pallor present, no cyanosis, icterus, clubbing, lymphadenopathy, edema, mild dehydration present
notes.investigations: ECG, USG abdomen - no sonological abnormality detected, RFT, LFT, Hemogram, ESR, CUE, Malarial parasite - negative, Chest x-ray

timeline.diagnosis: Acute Gastroenteritis (infective cause) with ruptured sebaceous cyst with polyarthralgia under evaluation with pancytopenia
timeline.treatment: IVF - NS and RL @ 75 ml/hr, plenty of oral fluids, Inj. pantop 40 mg IV OD, Inj. Zofer 4 mg IV SOS, Inj. Ceftriaxone 1 gm IV BD, Tab. dolo 650 mg po sos, Tab. Sporolac -DS po sos, thrombophore ointment for l/a, I/O and temperature charting

notes.physical_exam: patient is afebrile, PR-86 bpm, BP - 110/70 mmHg, RR - 20 cpm, SPO2 - 96 % at RA, CVS - S1 S2 +, CNS - NAD, RS - BAE +, P/A - soft, non tender
notes.investigations: Reticulocyte count - 0.5, Absolute reticulocyte count - 0.3, RI - 0.1, T3 - 0.86, T4 - 10.04, TSH - 7.38, Spot protein creatinine ratio - 0.75
